title: How can I get the baking type of a light component through scripting?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • The API to get the baking type directly is not available.

sections.title: Cause
content: The scripting API does not have a direct method to get the baking type of the lights configured in the scene.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You can use the SerializedObject/SerializedProperty system and access the m_Lightmapping property.

sections.title: More Information
content: This article applies to Unity versions 5.0+
